title: Nicolas Roeg - Performance - 1970
description:
<a href="http://imdb.com/title/tt0066214/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://imdb.com/title/tt0066214/</a>
There&#039;s another director credit here, Donald Cammell.

James Foxx puts in a delightfully thuggish performance here.  Mick Jagger, in my opinion, missed his calling to be an actor.  Here he muses entertainingly about aging
Perhaps the primordial sludge that inspired Guy Ritchie&#039;s early features.

With Anita Pallenberg and a fine collection of louts.

Uncompressed NTSC files

Keep those Roeg torrents seeding!
